solution_line_template: The number of cars in the back parking lot was {front_cars}*{times_more_back} = <<{front_cars}*{times_more_back}={back_cars}>>{back_cars} times more than those in the front parking lot.
There were {back_cars}+{front_cars} = <<{back_cars}+{front_cars}={total_back}>>{total_back} cars in the back parking lot.
A total of {total_back}+{front_cars} = <<{total_back}+{front_cars}={total_before_play}>>{total_before_play} cars were present before the play began
The total number of cars that parked in the theater during the play is {total_end}-{total_before_play} = <<{total_end}-{total_before_play}={cars_parked_during_play}>>{cars_parked_during_play} cars
